item.title: The Personal Branding Defence
item.description: Start by knowing what you want and who you are, build credibility around it and deliver it online in a compelling way. â€” Krista Neher You are a brand If you are not branding yourself, others are doing it for you. Going to a job interview, leasing a house or doing business then your name will be googled. Personal branding is about managing your name in a world of misinformation, disinformation, and semi-permanent Google records1.
